comment: Brexit betrayal starts tonight!(17th Oct ) Steven Woolfe MEP Just before the war most of Parliament wanted to surrender to Hitler. The Labour partly were pushing surrender terms It was Churchill in Parliament who stood up and said we should never surrender He was mocked just as they are doing to Boris

                        :name (n4 / name

                  :mod (s3 / surrender-01))

            :op2 (s5 / say-01

                        :ARG1 (s6 / surrender-01

      :snt5 (m3 / mock-01
